Test Name: BCR/ABL1 Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor Resistance Kinase Domain Mutation Screen (Sanger Sequencing)
Specimen Type: Peripheral blood or bone marrow aspirate
Purpose: To detect mutations in the kinase domain of the BCR/ABL1 gene that confer resistance to tyrosine kinase inhibitors.
Equipment: Thermocycler, centrifuge, micro-pipettes with tips, PCR tubes, gel electrophoresis apparatus, DNA sequencer, cooler block
